exploreMoreDescription: Discover our full range of premium vitamins and supplements
aboutContent: Highly effective vitamin B5 500 mg per vegan-friendly capsule - each capsule contains 500 mg of vitamin B5 (pantothenic acid). Vitamin B5 is a water-soluble vitamin that plays a crucial role in energy metabolism, hormone synthesis, and nerve function. It supports energy metabolism, helps produce red blood cells, contributes to hormone and cholesterol synthesis, promotes healthy skin, and helps metabolize carbohydrates, fats and proteins. Our supplements are GMO free, GMP compliant, and manufactured in certified facilities meeting strict EU/UK regulations.
descriptionContent: Nutriota Vitamin B5 pantothenic acid offers high-dose 500 mg vitamin B5 per capsule, with 120 capsules (4 months supply) per bottle. This essential nutrient supports natural energy metabolism, reduces fatigue, and is crucial for overall health and well-being. By supplementing your daily diet with our high-quality vitamin B5, you support natural body functions. Vitamin B5 is part of the vitamin B complex and plays a vital role in various bodily processes including energy production and hormone synthesis.
ingredientsContent: Calcium D-pantothenate (pantothenic acid), capsule shell (coating agent: hydroxypropylmethylcellulose), filler (microcrystalline cellulose), release agent (magnesium salts of fatty acids, silicon dioxide).
informationContent: Units: 105.0 gram | Brand: Nutriota | Format: Capsule
